short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically convert non-US units to freedom units (US-based) on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Freedom Units Only is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to make life easier for US-based users by converting all metric, non-US units, and currencies into familiar US units directly within any webpage. Whether it's temperature, distance, weight, volume, or even compound units, this extension has you covered. With an easy toggle button, you can turn conversions on or off at will, and hover over converted values to see the original units.
